When Conqueror's Galleon attacks, exile it at end of combat, then return it to the battlefield transformed.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Wildgrowth Walker
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control explores, put a +1/+1 counter on Wildgrowth Walker and you gain 3 life.

cards.name: Wanted Scoundrels
cards.text: When Wanted Scoundrels dies, target opponent creates two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Drover of the Mighty
cards.text:
Drover of the Mighty gets +2/+2 as long as you control a Dinosaur. 
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

cards.name: Siren Stormtamer
cards.text:
Flying
{U}, Sacrifice Siren Stormtamer: Counter target spell or ability that targets you or a creature you control.

cards.name: Lightning Strike
cards.text: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Shapers of Nature
cards.text:
{3}{G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

{2}{U}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from a creature you control: Draw a card.

cards.name: Primal Amulet
cards.text:
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, put a charge counter on Primal Amulet. Then if there are four or more charge counters on it, you may remove those counters and transform it.

cards.name: Primal Wellspring
cards.text:
(Transforms from Primal Amulet.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. When that mana is used to cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy that spell and you may choose new targets for the copy.

cards.name: Deadeye Quartermaster
cards.text: When Deadeye Quartermaster enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment or Vehicle card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Wakening Sun's Avatar
cards.text: When Wakening Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand, destroy all non-Dinosaur creatures.

cards.name: Ixalan's Binding
cards.text:
When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield.

Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

cards.name: Huatli, Warrior Poet
cards.text:
+2: You gain life equal to the greatest power among creatures you control.

0: Create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

-X: Huatli, Warrior Poet deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Creatures dealt damage this way can't block this turn.

cards.name: Sentinel Totem
cards.text:
When Sentinel Totem enters the battlefield, scry 1.

{T}, Exile Sentinel Totem: Exile all cards from graveyards.

cards.name: Stone Quarry
cards.text:
Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Sun-Blessed Mount
cards.text: When Sun-Blessed Mount enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Huatli, Dinosaur Knight, reveal it, then put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.name: Huatli's Spurring
cards.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. If you control a Huatli planeswalker, that creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn instead.

cards.name: Huatli's Snubhorn
cards.text: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

cards.name: Woodland Stream
cards.text:
Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Jace's Sentinel
cards.text: As long as you control a Jace planeswalker, Jace's Sentinel gets +1/+0 and can't be blocked.

cards.name: Grasping Current
cards.text:
Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand.

Search your library and/or  graveyard for a card named Jace, Ingenious Mind-Mage, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.

cards.name: Castaway's Despair
cards.text:
Enchant creature

When Castaway's Despair enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature.

Enchanted creature doesn't untap during it's controller's untap step.

cards.name: Huatli, Dinosaur Knight
cards.text:
+2: Put two +1/+1 counters on up to one target Dinosaur you control.

-3: Target Dinosaur you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

-7: Dinosaurs you control get +4/+4 until end of turn.

cards.name: Jace, Ingenious Mind-Mage
cards.text:
+1: Draw a card.

+1: Untap all creatures you control.

-9: Gain control of up to three target creatures.

cards.name: Marauding Looter
cards.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, you may draw a card. If you do discard a card.

cards.name: Raging Swordtooth
cards.text:
Trample

When Raging Swordtooth enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each other creature.

cards.name: Kumena's Speaker
cards.text: Kumena's Speaker gets +1/+1 as long as you control another Merfolk or an Island.

cards.name: Dusk Legion Dreadnought
cards.text:
Vigilance

Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Pillar of Origins
cards.text:
As Pillar of Origins enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

cards.name: Bellowing Aegisaur
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.

cards.name: Deathless Ancient
cards.text:
Flying

Tap three untapped Vampires you control: Return Deathless Ancient from your graveyard to your hand.

cards.name: Deeproot Waters
cards.text: Whenever you cast a Merfolk spell, create a 1/1 blue Merfolk creature token with hexproof. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

cards.name: Dire Fleet Captain
cards.text: Whenever Dire Fleet Captain attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other attacking Pirate.

cards.name: Deadeye Plunderers
cards.text:
Deadeye Plunderers gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control.

{2}{U}{B}: Create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Belligerent Brontodon
cards.text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.

cards.name: Call to the Feast
cards.text: Create three 1/1 white Vampire creature tokens with lifelink.

cards.name: Unfriendly Fire
cards.text: Unfriendly Fire deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

cards.name: Sleek Schooner
cards.text: Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Tishana's Wayfinder
cards.text: When Tishana's Wayfinder enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Prosperous Pirates
cards.text: When Prosperous Pirates enters the battlefield, create two colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Deadeye Tormentor
cards.text: Raid — When Deadeye Tormentor enters the battlefield, if you attacked with a creature this turn, target opponent discards a card.

cards.name: Sun-Crowned Hunters
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Sun-Crowned Hunters is dealt damage, it deals 3 damage to target opponent.

cards.name: Jace, Cunning Castaway
cards.text:
+1: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player this turn, draw a card, then discard a card.

-2: Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token with "When this creature becomes the target of a spell, sacrifice it."

-5: Create two tokens that are copies of Jace, Cunning Castaway, except they're not legendary.

cards.name: Treasure Cove
cards.text:
(Transforms from Treasure Map.)
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice a Treasure: Draw a card.

cards.name: Treasure Map
cards.text: {1}, {T}: Scry1. Put a landmark counter on Treasure Map. Then if there are three or more landmark counters on it, remove those counters, transform Treasure Map and create three colorless Treasure artifact tokens with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Sword-Point Diplomacy
cards.text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. For each of those cards, put that card into your hand unless any opponent pays 3 life. Then exile the rest.

cards.name: Fleet Swallower
cards.text: Whenever Fleet Swallower attacks, target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded up, into his or her graveyard.

cards.name: Regisaur Alpha
cards.text:
Other Dinosaurs you control have haste.

When Regisaur Alpha enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Dinosaur creature token with trample.

cards.name: Deathgorge Scavenger
cards.text: Whenever Deathgorge Scavenger enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile target card from a graveyard. If a creature card is exiled this way, you gain 2 life. If a noncreature card is exiled this way, Deathgorge Scavenger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Spell Swindle
cards.text: Counter target spell. Create X colorless Treasure artifact tokens, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. They have "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."

cards.name: Bishop of Rebirth
cards.text:
Vigilance

Whenever Bishop of Rebirth attacks, you may return target creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Kopala, Warden of Waves
cards.text:
Spells your opponents cast that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to cast.

Abilities your opponents activate that target a Merfolk you control cost {2} more to activate.

cards.name: Walk the Plank
cards.text: Destroy target non-Merfolk creature.

cards.name: Unclaimed Territory
cards.text:
As Unclaimed Territory enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.

{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type.

cards.name: Burning Sun's Avatar
cards.text: When Burning Sun's Avatar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target opponent and 3 damage to up to one target creature.

cards.name: Old-Growth Dryads
cards.text: When Old-Growth Dryads enters the battlefield, each opponent may search his or her library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Ashes of the Abhorrent
cards.text:
Players can't cast spells from graveyards or activate abilities of cards in graveyards.

Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.

cards.name: Settle the Wreckage
cards.text: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search his or her library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

cards.name: Priest of the Wakening Sun
cards.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, gain 2 life.

{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wakening Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

cards.name: Sanguine Sacrament
cards.text: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.

cards.name: River's Rebuke
cards.text: Return all nonland permanents target player controls to their owner's hand.

cards.name: Vraska's Contempt
cards.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. You gain 2 life.

cards.name: Deadeye Tracker
cards.text: {1}{B}, {T}: Exile two target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Deadeye Tracker explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Fathom Fleet Captain
cards.text:
Menace 

Whenever Fathom Fleet Captain attacks, if you control another nontoken Pirate, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 2/2 black Pirate creature token with menace.

cards.name: Boneyard Parley
cards.text: Exile up to five target creature cards from graveyards. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put all cards from the pile of your choice onto the battlefield under your control and the other into their owner's graveyards.

cards.name: Gishath, Sun's Avatar
cards.text:
Trample, vigilance, haste 

Whenever Gishath, Sun's Avatar deals combat damage to a player, reveal that many cards from the top of your library. Put any number of Dinosaur creature cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Tilonalli's Skinshifter
cards.text:
Haste

Whenever Tilonalli's Skinshifter attacks, it becomes a copy of another target nonlegendary attacking creature until end of turn.

cards.name: Tocatli Honor Guard
cards.text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

cards.name: Admiral Beckett Brass
cards.text:
Other Pirates you control get +1/+1. 

At the beginning of your end step, gain control of target nonland permanent controlled by a player who was dealt combat damage by three or more Pirates this turn.

cards.name: Sunbird's Invocation
cards.text: Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is that spell's converted mana cost. You may cast a card revealed this way with converted mana cost X or less without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
cards.text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

cards.name: Star of Extinction
cards.text: Destroy target land. Star of Extinction deals 20 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

cards.name: Angrath's Marauders
cards.text: If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

cards.name: Herald of Secret Streams
cards.text: Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them can't be blocked.

cards.name: Shapers' Sanctuary
cards.text: Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card.

cards.name: Verdant Sun's Avatar
cards.text: Whenever Verdant Sun's Avatar or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.name: Carnage Tyrant
cards.text:
Carnage Tyrant can't be countered. 

Trample, hexproof

cards.name: Waker of the Wilds
cards.text: {X}{G}{G}: Put X +1/+1 counters on target land you control. That land becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

cards.name: Ripjaw Raptor
cards.text: Enrage — Whenever Ripjaw Raptor is dealt damage, draw a card.

Flying

cards.text: Whenever Emperor's Vanguard deals combat damage to a player, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Entrancing Melody
cards.text: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost X.

cards.name: Revel in Riches
cards.text:
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool." 

At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control ten or more Treasures, you win the game.

cards.name: Tishana, Voice of Thunder
cards.text:
Tishana, Voice of Thunder's power and toughness are equal to the number of cards in your hand.

You have no maximum hand size.

When Tishana enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control.

cards.name: Dire Fleet Ravager
cards.text:
Menace, deathtouch

When Dire Fleet Ravager enters the battlefield, each player loses a third of his or her life, rounded up.

cards.name: Deeproot Champion
cards.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Deeproot Champion.

cards.name: Dreamcaller Siren
cards.text:
Flash

Flying

Dreamcaller Siren can only block creatures with flying.

When Dreamcaller Siren enters the battlefield, if you control another Pirate, tap up to two target nonland permanents.

cards.name: Goring Ceratops
cards.text:
Double strike

Whenever Goring Ceratops attacks, other creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Hostage Taker
cards.text: When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile target artifact or creature until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

cards.name: Sunpetal Grove
cards.text:
Sunpetal Grove enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Forest or a Plains.
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Ruin Raider
cards.text: Raid — At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with a creature this turn, reveal the top card of your library and put it into your hand. You lose life equal to the card's converted mana cost.

cards.name: Rootbound Crag
cards.text:
Rootbound Crag enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Bloodcrazed Paladin
cards.text:
Flash
Bloodcrazed Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each creature that died this turn.

cards.name: Captain Lannery Storm
cards.text:
Haste
Whenever Captain Lannery Storm attacks, create a colorless Treasure artifact token with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.”
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure, Captain Lannery Storm gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

cards.name: Vanquisher's Banner
cards.text:
As Vanquisher’s Banner enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures of the chosen type get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a creature spell of the chosen type, draw a card.

cards.name: Dragonskull Summit
cards.text:
Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.
{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Drowned Catacomb
cards.text:
Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.
{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Glacial Fortress
cards.text:
Glacial Fortress enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.
{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.

cards.name: Rowdy Crew
cards.text:
Trample
When Rowdy Crew enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then discard two cards at random. If two cards that share a card type are discarded this way, put two +1/+1 counters on Rowdy Crew.

cards.name: Arcane Adapation
cards.text:
As Arcane Adaptation enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
Creatures you control are the chosen type in addition to their other types. The same is true for creature spells you control and creature cards you own that aren’t on the battlefield.

cards.name: Daring Saboteur
cards.text:
{2}{U}: Daring Saboteur can’t be blocked this turn.
Whenever Daring Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.

cards.name: Sorcerous Spyglass
cards.text:
As Sorcerous Spyglass enters the battlefield, look at an opponent’s hand, then choose any card name.
Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can’t be activated unless their mana abilities.
